description:
A fast static site generator in a single binary with everything built-in. Documentation is available on [its site](https://www.getzola.org/documentation/getting-started/installation/) or
in the `docs/content` folder of the repository.

This tool and the template engine it is using ([Tera](https://github.com/Keats/tera)) were born from an intense dislike of the (insane) Golang template engine and therefore of Hugo that I was using before for 6+ sites.

### List of features

- Single binary
- Syntax highlighting
- Sass compilation
- Assets co-location
- (Basic currently) multilingual site suport
- Image processing
- Themes
- Shortcodes
- Internal links
- External link checker
- Table of contents automatic generation
- Automatic header anchors
- Aliases
- Pagination
- Custom taxonomies
- Search with no servers or any third parties involved
- Live reload
- Deploy on many platforms easily: Netlify, Vercel, Cloudflare
- Breadcrumbs
summary: A fast static site generator in a single binary with everything built-in
